name: PHEP-Public Health Emergency Preparedness Registry
short_desc: Registry's purpose is to map out and identify individuals that may require assistance in a local emergency or disaster in Alameda County
description: Registry's purpose is to identify individuals that may require assistance in a local emergency or disaster. It is intended to link frail seniors, persons with disabilities, nonambulatory, homebound, and individuals, if left unattended for 24-48 hours, are at risk of serious illness, injury or death, to resources such as preparedness and training's. In the event of local emergency or disaster, ACPHD -  PHEP Registry will provide emergency responders important information about people in affected areas that need  specialized help.
